thread.title: Myanmar to sign peace deal with 8 rebel groups on 15 Oct – 4 Oct 2015
thread.title_full: Myanmar to sign peace deal with 8 rebel groups on 15 Oct – 4 Oct 2015

author: centennial
title: Myanmar to sign peace deal with 8 rebel groups on 15 Oct – 4 Oct 2015
text: Home › The Asian Pulse › Daily News › Myanmar to sign peace deal with 8 rebel groups on 15 Oct – 4 Oct 2015 Myanmar to sign peace deal with 8 rebel groups on 15 Oct – 4 Oct 2015 Sunday, October 4th, 2015 ”The NCA (Nationwide Ceasefire Agreement) will be signed on 15 Oct in Naypyidaw,” Hla Maung Shwe, a senior member of the government’s negotiating team, told AFP, adding that eight groups including the prominent Karen National Union were on board. ”We will keep inviting all ethnic armed groups to sign,” he said, referring to the 15 rebel organisations the government has agreed to negotiate with. Major groups including the Kachin Independence Army have refused to sign the agreement, and clashes between them and government troops have intensified in recent weeks as the negotiations reach a critical juncture.
